title: What is the interpretation of a dream about the birth of a daughter according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a girl refers to many different interpretations and meanings, which vary from one vision to another according to the different events that occur during it, as well as the situation that the viewer is going through at that time and the various crises that he is going through in his life. In general, and through this article, we will learn about the most prominent interpretations of seeing the birth of a girl in a dream in all cases. Interpretation of the dream of giving birth to a girl: Seeing the birth of a girl in a dream means kindness and abundant nourishment that the viewer will receive in his life in the coming period, as well as experiencing a period of prosperity and happiness soon. That there are some positive changes that will occur in the fortuneteller’s life during the coming period. Interpretation of the dream about the birth of a daughter by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing the birth of a girl in a dream indicates a change in the fortuneteller’s circumstances for the better, as well as living in peace and peace of mind during the coming period. Ibn Sirin explained that Seeing a girl giving birth in a dream indicates a change in some things that will happen in the dreamer’s life during the coming period and that he will live a happy life during the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to an unmarried girl: Seeing a girl giving birth in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that there are some fears that she is currently suffering from. And she constantly thinks about how to get rid of it. For an unmarried woman to see in a dream that she is giving birth to a girl and feels happy, this means that she has heard some happy news that will put her in a better psychological state, and she must be careful. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a girl without pain for an unmarried woman. To dream of giving birth to a girl without pain Pain for an unmarried woman means that she will overcome some of the difficult crises she is going through at the moment and live safely, and this will make her happier. Seeing a girl giving birth without pain in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates improved relations with all the people around her and life in peace and security during The coming period. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a beautiful girl for an unmarried woman. Seeing the birth of a beautiful girl in a dream for an unmarried woman means getting rid of all the worries and difficult problems that she is experiencing at the present time, in addition to living safely. Sins. Seeing the birth of a beautiful girl in a dream indicates the abundance of sustenance that an unmarried woman will receive in reality, as well as achieving more ambitions and goals that she pursues. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a girl for a married woman. Seeing the birth of a baby girl for a married woman in a dream means that she will have more Food and kindness will make her in a better psychological state in the coming period. If a married woman dreams that she will give birth to a beautiful baby girl and feels happy, this is evidence of happiness with the husband and freedom from worries. A married woman seeing in a dream that she gives birth to an ugly girl and feels afraid means that there will be some problems that will arise. Between spouses in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a beautiful girl for a married woman. Seeing the birth of a beautiful girl in a dream for a married woman indicates that her luck with the husband will improve and she will live a happy life in the coming period. Seeing the birth of a beautiful girl in

title: Interpretation of a ship in a dream and riding it with a person

preview.html: We present to you the interpretation of a ship in a dream, as it is one of the dreams that wanders with you between the world of imagination and reality, to make the viewer feel that he is wandering in the world between the East and the Maghreb. The present and the past that passes through us from time to time, as each of these dreams has its meanings and symbols presented by scholars in their efforts to trace the secrets and mysteries of this dream through the science of interpretation. Interpretation of a ship in a dream. Many scholars have interpreted seeing a ship in a dream, which we will explain through the lines The following are among the interpretations of scholarly commentators, especially the scholar Ibn Sirin, so let us go. The symbol of the ship in a dream. The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that the departure of the ship and its movement on land does not symbolize good, as the departure of the ship from its course is a sign of bad deeds. As for whoever sees the ship departing The port, harbour, or beach designated for it, this indicates departure from obedience to God and the straight path. As the ship traveling on the shore indicates that the man is about to divorce his wife, and stay with her without marrying her without legal support, and God knows best. It is worth noting that the scholars They interpreted seeing a ship on land as a stumble in livelihood and obstacles in work, and away from this stumble, the dreamer searches for a way to earn a living, and God Almighty gave him that. That after hardship he will find comfort and comfort. Interpretation of a dream about riding a ship with someone The scholar Ibn Sirin removed the ambiguity about seeing a ship in a dream, so here are the most prominent interpretations he gave in the following lines. If one sees that he is riding a ship in a dream, this means that the dreamer will soon marry a woman It protects the period of his term. And whoever dreams in a dream that he was at sea and entered a ship and disobeyed, this indicates his repentance, repentance, and advice to God. But if the dreamer dreams that he is boarding a ship in a dream and he is sick, this indicates that God will remove illness, sadness, and sorrow from him. If the dreamer sees In a dream, he is riding a ship with a dead person. This indicates his liberation from the adversities of this world. To dream of seeing a ship on a ship in a dream for a poor person is interpreted as salvation from poverty or payment of a debt and also symbolizes abundance of livelihood or shows a prisoner escaping from captivity. Dreaming of riding a ship in a dream means that The seeker of knowledge acquires useful knowledge from the man of knowledge. This interpretation goes back to the story of Al-Khidr and Moses, peace be upon him. Riding a ship in a dream symbolizes the return of lost people or lost money and things. Also, boarding a ship in a dream indicates the return of the isolated person to his place or the one who lost part of his place, his trade or his money, immediately, by God. The Most High and Most Knowing. If the ship reaches the ground or the fortuneteller descends from it, this indicates speedy salvation, the death of worry, and salvation. A dream about driving in a car in a calm atmosphere and prepared for travel. This indicates his escape from punishment in the future. Through this article, we reviewed many of the interpretations that appeared regarding seeing the ship, boarding it, and disembarking from it. It must be noted here that these interpretations are nothing but the jurisprudence of scholars, and we should not allow

title: Interpretation of a dream about praying facing the Qiblah

preview.html: An unmarried girl dreams that she is praying against the qiblah. It indicates that The dreamer performs unpleasant actions and that God is Most High and Most Knowing. Or if he sees that he is praying against the direction of the Qiblah and becomes afraid in the dream. He will return to God and return to what was. On the other hand, if an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream praying against the direction of the Qiblah by force. The vision showed Bad people who were present in the life of the person who had the vision. When he saw the prayer facing the Qiblah, he regretted it in the dream. The vision showed a return from the sins that he had committed, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. What if she saw that there was someone forcing her to pray in the dream. The dream indicates the presence of sinners in Her life. Seeing someone praying in the opposite direction with an unknown person in a dream symbolizes an unmarried girl. In the presence of someone who is not confident in the life of the visionary. Seeing someone praying with someone who knows her and advising her not to pray in the opposite direction of the Qiblah in the dream can be interpreted. It is a sign of marrying someone. Saleh wants to straighten him on the straight path. See also: Interpretation of seeing prayer in the mosque in a dream. Interpretation of following the direction of the Qiblah in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is praying in the opposite direction of the Qiblah. It is a sign of the mistakes she has committed in her life, and God knows best. But if she sees that she is praying with If a married woman sees that she is praying in the opposite direction of the Qiblah and becomes afraid in the dream, it indicates the return of sins and sadness for the past, and God knows best. The vision of praying with people in the opposite direction can be interpreted The kiss in a dream by a married woman. For bad friends who live a noisy life. The vision of praying against the direction of the Qiblah, and not wanting to return to the dream of a married woman. In inappropriate actions, and perhaps in inappropriate actions on the part of fanatics. It has been interpreted as a vision Praying in the direction of the Qiblah in a married woman’s dream. It is a sign of mistakes and not necessarily sins in some cases of a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about praying in the opposite direction of the Qiblah in a man’s dream and its meaning. A married man dreams that he is praying for his uncle in the direction of the Qiblah. It is one of the dreams that portends evil to the dreamer, that is, it is one of Dreams that warn the dreamer. If he sees that he is praying in the opposite direction to the Qiblah, and wants to go back to what he is doing in the dream of a married man. The vision shows the sins from which he wants to return to reality. The interpretation of prayer is contrary to the direction of the Qiblah, but he does not want to reverse it in the dream of a married man. And the sign of seeking forgiveness. Retracting what he did or said is not good. It may mean that he is committing obscene acts in the life of the dreamer, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. The vision of praying in the opposite direction of the Qiblah with his wife in a married man’s dream has been interpreted about the necessity of returning to God Almighty, and turning to

title: Interpretation of seeing cockroaches in a dream, complete interpretations by Wasim Yusuf, Ibn Sirin, and Al-Usaimi

preview.html: Here, dear reader, is the interpretation of seeing cockroaches in a dream by Wassim Youssef. It is one of the visions that carry negative feelings for the fortuneteller, so he turns around as soon as he wakes up from his sluggishness in search of explanations that came. In a dream about a cockroach, seeing it can cause anxiety because it covers its body in dark color. It also terrifies the dreamer if a bird wanders around him or tries to break into his house. What are these meanings and symbols that this vision carries? ?? Is this vision worthy of praise? Or a vision that does not bode well? Seeing cockroaches in a dream Wassim Youssef The journalist Wassim Youssef interpreted the vision of cockroaches in a dream after receiving many questions about dreams of cockroaches in a dream. What are the connotations and symbols that his vision carries? Dreaming of cockroaches in a dream according to Waseem Youssef’s interpretations. Be envious of the hatred and words that do not please God that some say about the dreamer. The dream symbolizes the presence of a large number of cockroaches in the house. In the many disputes that come in the life of the fortuneteller, as well as in the problems that are exposed to him as a result of the family problems that occur in his family, which require us to deal with them wisely, logically, and with extreme flexibility. Seeing cockroaches entering the house indicates the losses that the viewer is exposed to in reality, and God knows best. It indicates Seeing cockroaches in a dream. The dreamer needs to return to God and think about what he says and what he does and not take a step that does not please God and His Messenger, so as not to fall into problems that cause anxiety to himself and burden him with heavy losses. Interpretation of seeing cockroaches in a dream. To the bad companions present in the dreamer’s life, as well as people who are not loyal to him or who do not love him, he must review his accounts, and God knows best. Seeing cockroaches in a dream is interpreted as repeated defamation of others and exposure to magic and envy. Seeing the dreamer chasing a cockroach in a dream and killing it or running away from it . He is envied by the eye of the eye, but God Almighty protects and protects him, and he draws closer to God by reciting the legal ruqyah and reciting the Holy Qur’an. Seeing cockroaches in a dream is one of those visions that do not bode well, as it indicates that the dreamer will be afflicted with envy and witchcraft or be exposed to an insulting word from others, and by God I know. Seeing cockroaches in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin pointed out several interpretations of seeing cockroaches in a dream, which we consider below: The dream interpretation scholar Ibn Sirin interprets seeing cockroaches in a dream and killing them as the removal of envy from the eye, as it shows that the body does not envy it, but rather is liberated from the negatives that afflict it. Human. . As a result of the power of the eye, and getting rid of it permanently. Seeing catching a cockroach in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s bad companions who will envy him and bring him more problems and troubles, but with the passage of time the dreamer’s condition will improve. Seeing cockroaches in the dreamer’s dream indicates evil people, enmity, envy, and jinn. Some people gossip about the fortune teller and utter phrases and words that do not exist in the fortune teller. Seeing a cockroach coming out of the drain indicates. In the problems presented to you as a result of a family member who makes everyone else

title: Interpretation of smoking in a dream - To see someone smoking in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about smoking in a dream by Ibn Sirin Smoking from someone close to you, single, married, pregnant, divorced, male Smoking in a dream is one of the most difficult things that a person sees in a dream, and this is due to the psychological state and excessive smoking in real life, as smoking is one of the most difficult things that a person sees in a dream. Which harms a person in public life and causes it completely. Destruction of health. Smoking in a dream is evidence of a previous warning about a number of dangers that could occur in the future, as cigarette smoke can be one of the mysterious signs in your life. Interpretation of smoking in a dream Smoking in a dream is evidence that you need to take a vacation due to psychological stress. Cigarette smoke Black smoke in a dream is evidence of problems and losses that a person may face in the near future, and if you see bright smoke in a dream, it is evidence of success in life, but for a short time. Enjoying smoking in a dream is evidence that you feel lonely in reality. Seeing yourself smoking in a dream Not smoking in reality is evidence that you are suffering from one of life’s problems. If you are a smoker, this is evidence that you are surrendering to problems. Smoking in a dream in a place that does not allow you to smoke is evidence that you are suffering from problems and have given up solving them. Seeing people smoking while quitting Smoking is a sign that they will bother you. Smoking and trapping smoke inside the body indicates a secret that you have been hiding from everyone and that you have revealed the secret to someone close to you, but you are afraid that your matter will be exposed to others. Quitting smoking in a dream is evidence that you will face a number of problems that you will face. And overcome it. Smoking in a dream is sometimes a sign of overeating. Smoking in a dream sometimes indicates the need to make friends with yourself. Smoking in a dream is evidence that you are gaining strength from a friend or relative. Seeing cigarette smoke in a dream is evidence of hope New in starting a romantic relationship that has ended. Lighting a cigarette in a dream is evidence that you will get a new job that will help you achieve a lot of profits, and if you see many cigarettes in a dream, this is evidence of the love of a rich friend near you. Seeing cigarette ashes in a dream is a sign that You have a problem that will disappear soon. Taking a cigarette from someone in a dream is a sign of defeat and conflict with someone. Buying cigarettes in a dream is a sign that you will defeat all enemies. Interpretation of smoking in a dream Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi emphasized in his interpretations that smoke in a dream is evidence of God’s punishment Almighty. Seeing smoke prevents him from seeing evidence that he has a fever. Smoke in a dream is a sign of harm that befalls people. Interpretation of smoke in a dreamSmoke in a dream is terror and torment from...

title: Interpretation of seeing evening dresses in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing evening dresses in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the website Vision roy2a.com. Single, married, pregnant, man, young, and divorced. What is the interpretation of an unmarried girl who sees an evening dress in a dream? Seeing a single girl wearing an evening dress in a dream is a sign of the imminence of her joy with a man with good morals and good behavior and people’s love for him. Seeing a single girl wearing a dress A red evening dress in a dream indicates her marriage to a previously married man. Seeing a woman alone in a blue dress in a dream is a sign of her relationship with a man who has huge wealth and lives a secret life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dead person wearing a wedding dress in a dream. What is the interpretation of a married woman who sees an evening dress in a dream? Seeing a married woman in a short evening dress in a dream is a sign of severe neglect from her husband and her family. Seeing a married woman in a long evening dress in a dream is an indication of her high morals and good conduct. Seeing a white evening dress in a dream is a sign of happiness and psychological comfort. Seeing a married woman in a blue evening dress is an indication of... It brought her a lot of goodness and food, and the black dress caused her feelings of sadness and psychological depression and the many differences between her and her husband. See also: Interpretation of seeing the details of the dress in a dream What is the interpretation of a man who sees evening dresses in a dream? A man who sees an evening dress in a dream The blue color indicates the opening of the door In front of a wide livelihood of visions. Seeing black dresses in a dream indicates the presence of disagreements and problems with others and brings him worry and sadness. Seeing a married man wearing his wife an evening dress suitable for the joys of her good offspring. A man seeing short dresses in a dream indicates his distance and shortcomings in relation to his wife and children. See also Interpretation of seeing my friend wearing a white wedding dress in a dream. What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman who sees evening dresses in a dream? Seeing a pregnant woman in evening dresses in a dream is a sign of beautiful beautiful girls. Seeing a pregnant woman in a long dress in a dream symbolizes a handsome boy and he will have a bright future. Vision A pregnant woman in an evening dress in a dream indicates the ease and ease of childbirth without any problems. What is the interpretation of a young man who sees an evening dress in a dream? Seeing a young man wearing an evening dress in a dream indicates the approach of a happy marriage and the beginning of a happy life with his fiancée. Seeing white evening dresses in a dream is a sign of His participation in the opportunity to travel to a distant land to secure his future. Seeing a single young man in a long dress in a dream indicates his high morals and the world’s love for him, and the morals of his beloved and her good behavior among men. A young man seeing ugly dresses in a dream indicates the destruction of his psyche due to many problems and pressures. See Also: Interpretation of seeing a white or red dress according to the color of the dream. What is the interpretation of seeing colorful evening dresses in a dream? Seeing colorful evening dresses in a dream indicates psychological stability and a feeling of security. Seeing a black evening dress in a dream indicates seclusion.

When you see tiring trips, it may be a sign of trouble and anxiety, and God knows the unseen. However, seeing trips by walking in a dream can be a sign of striving to achieve desires and goals, and God has knowledge of the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Hungary in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about traveling To Hungary in a dream can indicate freedom from sadness, and God knows the unseen. When you see a married woman traveling to Hungary in a dream, this may be a sign that you are getting rid of problems, and God knows the unseen. I know when a married woman sees traveling to Hungary, it may indicate the collapse of problems, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about renewing a passport in a dream. title: Interpretation of a dream about putting cufflinks on my hands in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about putting cufflinks on my hand in a dream. Some people want to know the interpretation of a dream about putting cufflinks on my hand in a dream, so you have to be careful and do not completely believe in these interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about putting cufflinks on my hand in a dream, if one sees cufflinks on his hand in In a dream, this indicates some problems that the dreamer will fall into during this period, and God knows best. The sweet clapping hand in the dream may indicate a serious difficulty that the dreamer may face in his life during those days. Whoever sees in his dream that he is putting on braces, it may indicate that some Changes in the dreamer’s life at that time, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing braces in a dream indicates a crisis that the dreamer may have suffered in his life in the previous period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about getting a tattoo in a dream If one saw that he was getting a tattoo in a dream This may mean that he will face many difficulties in his life, and God knows best. Dreaming of getting a tattoo in a dream may indicate some changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Whoever sees in his dream that he is putting a tattoo on his shoulder in a dream may It indicates an insult to his honor and he must ask for God’s help. Drawing a tattoo on the abdomen in a dream may indicate some health disorders that the insightful person may suffer from in his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of putting a watch on the hand in a dream, in the event that we see putting a watch on the hand in a dream. In a dream, this may indicate many obstacles that may appear to the dreamer in his life during those days. Dreaming of a wristwatch in a dream may indicate anxiety and tension that the dreamer has been experiencing for some time, and God knows best. Seeing wearing a wristwatch in a dream may indicate effort The great effort made by the visionary to change his life for the better. Whoever dreams that he was wearing a wristwatch in a dream may indicate a long period of waiting for work or to achieve a goal, and he must ask God for help. Interpretation of a dream about putting a prayer rug in a dream. Whoever dreams that he is putting a prayer rug in a dream It may indicate his great relationship with worship and obedience, thanks to God. A dream of sitting on a prayer rug in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s good circumstances, thanks to God at that time. Whoever sees in his dream that he is placing a prayer rug, it may indicate the fulfillment of the desires and goals of those days, thanks to God. Possibly. The vision of placing a prayer rug indicates the good offspring that the dreamer will provide for the coming period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of placing dental floss in a dream: If one sees that he is placing dental floss in a dream, this may indicate that financial conditions will improve for the better, thanks to God. The vision of putting dental floss in a dream may indicate Placing dental wire in a dream indicates the abundant money that the dreamer may acquire in his life at that time. Dreaming of placing dental braces and wires in a dream may indicate good skin that will come to the dreamer in the coming period, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing dental wire placed in a dream indicates stability. The family that the dreamer was enjoying at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about putting S

title: Interpretation and interpretation of a dream about asking for marriage in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about asking for marriage is one of the matters that God Almighty has prescribed for His servants. Marriage is one of the things that makes a person feel happy, male or female, as he feels comfort, stability, love and love. Attention: A person may see him in a dream or he may see someone asking him to marry him and learn. When interpreting a dream about a wedding, we decided to confront this dream and interpret it in detail through what follows from the lines. Interpretation of a dream about asking a man to marry a man dreams in a dream that he is marrying a girl and the dreamer is single, so it carries several meanings: If He married a girl in a dream that he knows in reality, then this is a sign of his reaching the goals that he seeks to achieve. And if he marries someone who he practically does not know or does not appear to him, then this may be a sign of the end of his life. This vision may be a sign of the end of his life and his departure. As for Whoever marries four women in a dream, this vision may indicate goodness and provision for him. And whoever sees in a dream that he married a woman and then died, this indicates that he will work and tire himself, and then he will gain nothing but his labor. Some commentators believe that the dream of marriage may be because the man He thinks a lot about marriage. As for a married man who sees himself married in a dream, this may indicate that he will enter into a new business project. Or that the dreamer is looking for a job other than his current job in order to increase his income. See also: Interpretation of dreams for a married woman getting married In a dream, one of the most famous interpreters proposes a marriage proposal from a well-known person. The dream vision of marriage differs from the person the dreamer knows, according to the dreamer. An unmarried girl who marries someone she knows, and is found dancing and singing, indicates that this person is a deceiver and should be paid attention to. If a married woman sees that she has gotten married From someone she knows, this indicates that there are problems between her and her family. These problems can lead to separation and estrangement from each other. As for a pregnant woman, this dream shows her that she will give birth soon. And in a man’s dream, this could be a sign that he will soon marry a girl. Good, with good morals. See also: Interpretation of a dream about incestuous marriage by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi. A dream about asking for a hand in marriage in a single woman’s dream. A single girl may feel optimistic when she dreams of someone asking her to marry him. Some dream interpreters have said that this dream may be the result of her thinking a lot about marriage, Because she thinks about him a lot. It makes the subconscious mind deal with it, which makes it see it in her sleep. And if the girl having the vision is not thinking about the subject of marriage or engagement, and does not occupy it, and she sees in her dream that someone asked for her hand in marriage, then the dream interpreters said that this dream could express someone’s desire To communicate with her, but she denies it, because she is not convinced of it, or she may be indifferent to it, or does not feel a desire to do so. See also: Interpretation of a dream about refusing marriage or engagement in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Asking for a hand in marriage in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in Her dream that she married someone other than her husband in reality, this indicates many things: It could be a symbol of food

title: Wearing a long jacket in a dream

preview.html: It is also associated with some social relationships with which people are closely linked, and in the following lines we learn about the interpretations of wearing a long coat in a dream. Interpretation of wearing a long jacket in a dream There are many interpretations related to wearing a long jacket in a dream, as it is a vision that can carry some good connotations, while some The other is not good, such as: Seeing a jacket in a dream could mean an unmarried woman. This indicates that she will get married soon. But if a married woman dreams that she is wearing a long jacket in her dream. This indicates that she will give birth to a healthy child, God willing. From On the other hand, seeing a long coat in a dream may indicate. In a way that suggests hiding and eliminating some defects in the dreamer. Especially if one is wearing someone else's jacket in the dream, this may indicate a problem. It can also symbolize the long jacket in the dream. You have A very close friend of insight, as it works to protect the dreamer’s interests and helps him in difficult situations in which he finds himself, in all aspects of career, family, or society. But when he wears a long jacket in a dream, it is very wide and very spacious. It has many benefits and abundant nutrition, which he may obtain soon, with permission. God. You may be interested: Interpretation of seeing a coat in a dream in detail. The dream of wearing a long coat in a man’s dream. There are some interpretations on this subject of wearing a long jacket in a dream, where among these indicators are all the following: When a person sees in a dream that he is wearing a thick coat that covers all parts of his body, including That is his face and hands. He is committing secret and wrong behavior that the dreamer cannot reveal under law, custom, or morality. It also indicates that he is a mysterious and abnormal character. If the jacket is old, patched, or worn. This indicates spreading the dreamer’s sense of security. It can also indicate That the person is in an unstable situation and needs the protection and care of the family. On the other hand, when a woman appears wearing a long jacket in a dream, but it is an expensive coat, an expensive coat or a genuine leather coat. This means that she is meeting a good and honest man who can help with anything And they will have a successful marriage project, God willing. Wearing a long jacket in a dream is also considered elegant and luxurious in men’s dreams. It is mentioned that he is a person with a good financial position and great immunity. In a woman’s dream, it is a position that expresses security and protection, and is often the source of a father or husband. On the other hand, a torn or torn jacket in a dream indicates discomfort or a psychological change in the personality of the dreamer. This personality is generally distorted wrongly to achieve goals and cheap whims and relies on this method, until it achieves its dreams. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a long jacket for a married woman: Wearing A long jacket in a dream has many interpretations according to the great commentator Ibn Sirin on the subject of a married woman, including: Ibn Sirin believes that wearing a jacket in a dream for a married woman, especially if it is a natural leather coat. It seems that her husband supports her and covers her life and his heart is full of love for her.
